sen.j: 桃山御陵前駅（ももやまごりょうまええき）は、京都府京都市伏見区観音寺町にある、近畿日本鉄道近鉄京都線の鉄道駅。
sen.e: Located in Kannonji-cho of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Momoyama Goryo-mae Station is a stop on Kintetsu Kyoto Line, a Kintetsu Corporation Line.
Located in Kannonji-cho of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, Momoyama Goryo-mae Station is a stop on Kintetsu Kyoto Line, a Kintetsu Corporation Line.
Momoyama Goryo-mae Station, located in Kannonji-cho of Fushimi Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture, is a stop on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line of the Kintetsu Corporation.
sen.cmt: 一部修正"Kintetsu Kyoto Line"→"the Kintetsu Kyoto Line"に変更しました。

sen.j: 相対式2面2線のプラットホームを持つ高架駅。
sen.e: It is an elevated station having two platforms opposite each other with two tracks in between.
It's an elevated station with two platforms opposite each other and two tracks in between.
It's an elevated station with two platforms opposite each other and two tracks in between.

sen.j: ホーム有効長は6両。
sen.e: Platforms have an effective length to accommodate six cars.
Each platform has a length sufficient to accommodate six cars.
Each platform has a length sufficient to accommodate six cars.

sen.j: 改札・コンコースは1階、ホームは2階にある。
sen.e: Tickets gates and concourse are located on the ground floor and platforms on the second.
The ticket gates and concourse are located on the ground floor, and platforms are on the second.
The ticket gates and concourse are located on the ground floor, and platforms are on the second.

sen.j: 改札口は1ヶ所のみ。
sen.e: Ticket gates are installed at only one place.
Ticket gates are found in only one place.
Ticket gates are found in only one place.

sen.j: 開業時から高架駅であった。
sen.e: It was an elevated station from the outset.
It was an elevated station from the outset.
It was an elevated station from the outset.

sen.j: 市街地であるため立体交差が要求され（桃山御陵参道との平面交差を当局が許可しなかったとの説もある）、地下線案は地下水脈を断つとして伏見の酒蔵から拒否されたためと伝わる。
sen.e: Grade separated crossing was required from its location in a built-up area (also rumored that the authorities did not approve grade crossing with the approach to the Momoyama Goryo Mausoleum) and said that the proposal for underground facilities was rejected by Fushimi "sake" brewers on grounds that such would block the underground water vein.

A grade-separated crossing was required due to its location in a built-up area; moreover, it was rumored that the authorities would not approve a grade crossing with the approach to the Momoyama Goryo Mausoleum, and it was said that the proposal for underground facilities was rejected by the Fushimi sake brewers on the grounds that it would block the underground water vein.

A grade-separated crossing was required due to its location in a built-up area; moreover, it was rumored that the authorities would not approve a grade crossing with the approach to the Momoyama Goryo Mausoleum, and it was said that the proposal for underground facilities was rejected by the Fushimi sake brewers on the grounds that it would block the underground water vein.

sen.j: 隣の近鉄丹波橋駅とは500mしか離れていない。
sen.e: The distance to neighboring Tambabashi Station is a meager 500m.
The distance to neighboring Tambabashi Station is a meager 500 meters.
The distance to neighboring Kintetsu Tanbabashi Station is a meager 500 meters.

sen.j: なお自動改札機は東芝製が設置されている。
sen.e: Automated ticket gates installed are of Toshiba manufacture.
The automated ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.
The automated ticket gates were manufactured by Toshiba.

sen.j: 赤い自動改札機（EG-2000）は出場時2枚一括処理、PiTaPa・ICOCAに対応する。
sen.e: Red colored automated ticket gates (EG-2000) can process two tickets together when exiting and PiTaPa Card and ICOCA Card compatible.
The red-colored automated ticket gates (EG-2000) can process two tickets together when exiting, and they're compatible with the PiTaPa and ICOCA cards.
The red-colored automated ticket gates (EG-2000) can process two tickets together when exiting, and they're compatible with the PiTaPa and ICOCA cards.

sen.j: 利用状況
sen.e: Utilization status
Usage status
Usage status

sen.j: 2005年11月8日の調査結果によると、1日の利用客は15,407人。
sen.e: According to a survey conducted on Nov. 8, 2005, the number of passengers getting on and off at this station on that particular day was 15,407.
According to a survey conducted on November 8, 2005, the number of passengers getting on and off at this station on that particular day was 15,407.
According to a survey conducted on November 8, 2005, the number of passengers getting on and off at this station on that particular day was 15,407.

sen.j: 近鉄の全調査対象駅（323駅、但し調査当時の数）中、47位。
sen.e: Ranked 47th amongst Kintetsu stations subject to the survey (323 stations at time of survey.)
It ranked forty-seventh among Kintetsu stations subject to the survey (323 stations at the time of the survey).
It ranked forty-seventh among Kintetsu stations subject to the survey (323 stations at the time of the survey).

sen.j: 京都線の駅（26駅、大和西大寺駅含む）の中では、9位。
sen.e: Ranked 9th amongst Kyoto Line stations (26 stations including Yamato-Saidaji Station.)
It ranked ninth among Kyoto Line stations (a total of 26, including Yamato-Saidaji Station).
It ranked ninth among Kyoto Line stations (a total of 26, including Yamato-Saidaiji Station).

sen.j: 京都府内の近鉄の駅（23駅）の中では、7位。
sen.e: Ranked 7th amongst Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.
It ranked seventh among Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.
It ranked seventh among Kintetsu stations (23 stations) located in Kyoto Prefecture.

Fushimi Momoyama Station - Keihan Main Line (Kintetsu Tambabashi Station, which is next, is the official station of transfer to the Keihan Main Line).
Fushimi Momoyama Station - Keihan Main Line (Kintetsu Tanbabashi Station, which is next, is the official station of transfer to the Keihan Main Line).

sen.j: 現在、近鉄桃山御陵前駅には、バス路線は乗り入れていない。
sen.e: There are no route buses serving Kintetsu Momoyama-goryu Station for the time being.
For the time being here are no route buses serving Kintetsu Momoyama-goryu Station.
For the time being there are no route buses serving Kintetsu Momoyama-Goryo-mae Station.

sen.j: 最寄バス停は、駅から徒歩3分の国道24号沿いにある御香宮前（京都市営バス）、 桃山（近鉄バス）となる。
sen.e: The nearest bus stops are Goko-no-Miya-mae bus stop (Kyoto City Bus) and Momoyama bus stop (Kintetsu Bus) located on National Highway Route No.24, 3 min. walk from the station.
The nearest bus stops are Goko-no-Miya-mae bus stop (Kyoto City Bus) and Momoyama bus stop (Kintetsu Bus) located on National Highway Route No. 24, a three-minute walk from the station.
The nearest bus stops are the Gokonomiya-mae bus stop (Kyoto City Bus) and the Momoyama bus stop (Kintetsu Bus) located on National Route 24, a three-minute walk from the station.

sen.j: なお、両バス停は同一地点である。
sen.e: Both bus stops are located side-by-side.
Both bus stops are located side-by-side.
Both bus stops are located side-by-side.

sen.j: また、西大手筋停留所も利用可能である。
sen.e: Getting on at Nishi-Otesuji bus stop is also possible.
It is also possible to get on at the Nishi-Otesuji bus stop.
It is also possible to get on at the Nishi-Otesuji bus stop.

sen.j: かつて伏見桃山城キャッスルランドが営業していた頃は近鉄バスの路線があったが、営業終了に伴って廃止された。
sen.e: Kintetsu Bus Co. Ltd. had a regular route in the days when Fushimi Yamashiro-jo Castle Land was in business, but discontinued when the facilities closed down.
Kintetsu Bus Co. Ltd. had a regular route in the days when Fushimi Yamashiro-jo Castle Land was in business, but that route was discontinued when the facilities closed.
Kintetsu Bus Co., Ltd. had a regular route in the days when Fushimi-Momoyama-jo Castle Land was in business, but that route was discontinued when the facilities closed.

sen.j: その後バス乗り場に商業施設が建設され、スーパーマーケットが営業中である。
sen.e: Commercial facilities were constructed thereafter where the bus stop once used to be located and a super market is now in business there.
Commercial facilities were subsequently constructed where the bus stop was once located, and a supermarket is now in business there.
Commercial facilities were subsequently constructed where the bus stop was once located, and a supermarket is now in business there.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）11月3日 奈良電気鉄道桃山御陵前～西大寺（現・大和西大寺駅）間開通時に開業。
sen.e: The station opened on Nov. 3, 1928 when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae Station and Saidaiji Station (now Yamato-Saidaiji Station) of Nara Electric Railway commenced operations.
The station opened on Nov. 3, 1928 when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae Station and Saidaiji Station (now Yamato-Saidaiji Station) of Nara Electric Railway commenced operations.
November 3, 1928: The station opened when the section between Momoyama Goryo-mae Station and Saidaiji Station (now Yamato-Saidaiji Station) of Nara Electric Railway commenced operations.

sen.j: 1928年（昭和3年）11月15日 奈良電気鉄道京都～桃山御陵前間開通。
sen.e: Nara Electric Railway's services between Kyoto and Momoyama Goryo-mae section commenced Nov. 15,1928.
Nara Electric Railway's services between Kyoto and Momoyama Goryo-mae section commenced November 15, 1928.
November 15, 1928: Nara Electric Railway's services between Kyoto and Momoyama Goryo-mae section commenced.

sen.j: 1963年（昭和38年）10月1日 会社合併により近畿日本鉄道の駅となる。
sen.e: Became a Kintetsu Corporation station on Oct. 1, 1963 from corporate merger.
Became a Kintetsu Corporation station on October 1, 1963, due to the corporate merger.
October 1, 1963: The station became a Kintetsu Corporation station due to the corporate merger.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年）4月1日 PiTaPa使用開始。
sen.e: PiTiPa Cards became usable on April 1, 2007.
PiTiPa cards became usable on April 1, 2007.
April 1, 2007: The use of PiTaPa Cards commenced.

sen.j: その他
sen.e: Others
Others
Others

sen.j: 1945年に丹波橋駅での相互乗り入れが開始されるまで、当駅と伏見桃山駅が当路線と京阪との連絡駅であった。
sen.e: This station and Fushimi-Momoyama Station were this Line's junction to Keihan until both Lines shared tracks to Tambabashi Station in 1945.
This station and Fushimi-Momoyama Station were the line's junction to Keihan until 1945, when both lines began sharing tracks to Tambabashi Station.
This station and Fushimi-Momoyama Station were the line's junction to Keihan until 1945, when both lines began sharing tracks to Tanbabashi Station.

sen.j: このこともあって京阪線の伏見桃山駅には急行が停車した。
sen.e: Such arrangement lead to express trains stopping at Keihan Line's Fushimi-Momoyama Station.
The arrangement made it possible for express trains to stop at Keihan Line's Fushimi-Momoyama Station.
The arrangement made it possible for express trains to stop at Keihan Line's Fushimi-Momoyama Station.

sen.j: 最寄の施設として、明治天皇陵があること（終点を一時的にここにしたのは、式典に間に合わせるためである）また奈良電鉄時代の本社所在地、さらに隣接して繁華な商店街がある。
sen.e: Establishments close nearby are the Emperor Meiji Mausoleum (why this station was at one time the terminal was to exepedite completion in time for ensuing ceremonial events,) the main office in the days of Nara Electric Railway and a busy shopping mall is in close proximity.
sen.cmt: 何を間に合わせる、また何の本社かが不詳である他、文章全体に繋がりがないように思われます。
sen.e: Nearby establishments include the Emperor Meiji Mausoleum (the completion of the terminal was expedited in time for the ensuing ceremonial events), the main office from the days of Nara Electric Railway and a busy shopping mall.

Nearby establishments include the Emperor Meiji Mausoleum (the completion of the terminal was expedited in time for the ensuing ceremonial events), the main office from the days of Nara Electric Railway and a busy shopping mall.

sen.j: 駅舎はこのため当時の設備としてはかなり高い水準である。
sen.e: Due to such circumstances, the station building is of rather high grade for an installation of those days.
Due to such circumstances, the station building is somewhat upscale for an installation of its time.
Due to such circumstances, the station building is somewhat upscale for an installation of its time.
